   - Complete 5-minute script

   - Voiceover script included

üåê RECOMMENDED PRODUCTION SETUP

Domain: rafael.ai ($50-100/year)

Subdomains:
  ‚Ä¢ rafael.ai ‚Üí Landing page (Vercel, FREE)
  ‚Ä¢ dashboard.rafael.ai ‚Üí Web Dashboard (Railway, $5/mo)
  ‚Ä¢ beta.rafael.ai ‚Üí Beta Program (Vercel, FREE)
  ‚Ä¢ docs.rafael.ai ‚Üí Documentation (ReadTheDocs, FREE)
  ‚Ä¢ api.rafael.ai ‚Üí REST API (Railway, included)
  ‚Ä¢ demo.rafael.ai ‚Üí Live Demo (DigitalOcean, $5/mo)

Total Cost: ~$11/month ($132/year + domain)
